sub_topic: Probability of drawing a certain card from a deck of cards
message_1: What is the probability of drawing the king of hearts from a standard deck of 52 playing cards?
message_2:
There is only 1 King of Hearts in a standard deck of 52 playing cards. Therefore, the probability of drawing the King of Hearts is:

1 (King of Hearts) / 52 (total cards) = 1/52 â‰ˆ 0.01923

So, the probability is approximately 0.01923 or 1.923% or 1 in 52.
